name: Dodge the Creeps - Godot First 2D Game Tutorial
name_original: Dodge the Creeps - Godot First 2D Game Tutorial
description:
Dodge the creeps and collect the coins. See how long you can stay alive.

This game is an iteration of the godot official 2d game tutorial. https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/getting_started/first_2d_game/index.html

This is my first attempt at creating a game.
